title: Delaney Arvidson
gameEffect: Place one token on this card. Remove a token to negate one Keyword CREATURE Adversary.
bio: As a toddler, Delaney Arvidson was imbued with psychokinetic abilities, the result of prolonged exposure to mystical runes hidden within her favorite stuffed animal. Agents Mulder and Scully learned of her powers while investigating a string of grisly murders near Delaney's home.

title: Knuffle Bunny
gameEffect: Adds 2 to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill. OCCULT Adversaries must assign damage to this Agent. This card is free if the attached Agent has the Keyword CUTE.
dialogue:
Delaney: "Will you help us find Knuffle Bunny?"
Mulder: "Knuffle Bunny?"
Katina Arvidson: "Her stuffed animal. It went missing two days ago."

title: Seamus the Cat
gameEffect: Play this card to gently push two cards off the top of your opponent's Bureau deck. The two cards are discarded.
dialogue:
Mulder: "What do you think, Scully? Should we ask him what he knows about the missing Knuffle Bunny?"
Scully: "I think we've dealt with enough cats, Mulder."

title: Stephen Arvidson
gameEffect: Place two tokens on this card. Remove a token to search through your Bureau deck and add one Keyword RESOURCE card to your hand. Show the card to your opponent and shuffle your deck.
bio: Stephen Arvidson is a reference librarian and the father of Delaney Arvidson. He and his wife sought to conceal their daughter's psychokinetic abilities. His research into Texas folklore uncovered evidence of a monster stalking the outskirts of Houston.

title: Unearthing the Monster
gameEffect: Play on a Team in the Field. If the Team makes an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check then you may search through your Bureau Deck and add any keyword CREATURE Adversary to your hand. Show the card to your opponent and shuffle your deck.
dialogue:
Mulder: "What is it, Delaney? What do you see?"
Delaney: "The monster. It lives here."
Mulder: "We have to go. We have to leave right now!"

title: Katina Arvidson
gameEffect: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check. The Witness's modifier is doubled if played on a Team that includes Delaney Arvidson.
dialogue:
Katina: "We couldn't bring ourselves to tell you. I mean, how do you tell someone your child can do things with her mind? How could anyone ever understand?"
Scully: "Believe me, Mrs. Arvidson, we do understand."

title: Living Scarecrow
gameEffect: The cost to play this card is 3 [CP] if the Site Prerequisite is OCCULT INVESTIGATION. LRC and CRC attacks cause only half damage (rounded up) to this Adversary.
dialogue:
Mulder: "Like other effigies, the scarecrow is an unintelligent creation, classically used by farmers to protect their crops."
Stephen Arvidson: "Right. Except this thing wasn't just warding off birds. It killed our neighbors."

title: Psychokinetic Attack
gameEffect: Play this card on any Agent with OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill of 1+ to make one LONG RANGE COMBAT attack at LRC skill: 7. The opposing side's LRC attack is negated if the damaged combatant's Health is reduced to 0.
dialogue: "I know this won't come as a shock to you, Mr. and Mrs. Arvidson, but your daughter has a unique psychokinetic ability. One that would give Carrie a run for her money." - Mulder

title: More Men in Black
gameEffect: Force an opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If unsuccessful, the Site Prerequisite is increased by 1 for each Agent on the Team that does not have a SUBTERFUGE skill value.
dialogue:
Mulder: "Where's the guy who looks like Alex Trebek?"
MIB Ray: "Why does everyone keep saying that? Dude looked nothing like him!"
Mulder: "Looked? As in past tense? What happened? Did he retire?"
MIB Rei: "Nah man. Pancreatic cancer, if you can believe that?"

title: Reproduction Movie Props
gameEffect: Adds 2 to the Agent's COMPUTER and SUBTERFUGE skills.
dialogue:
Mulder: "I'll bite, boys. What's with the toy guns?"
MIB Rei: "To help us blend in."
MIB Ray: "There's a cosplay convention in town. Pretty smart, huh?"
MIB Rei: "It was my idea."

title: Peter Shultz
gameEffect: Adds 2 to one Team's COMPUTER or adds 1 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.
dialogue:
Mulder: "Who found the body?"
Scully: "Peter Shultz. He works in Tech Support for the college. As it happens, he's the uncle of Delaney Arvidson, the child we met last month in Texas. It's probably just a coincidence."
Mulder: "You know how I feel about coincidences."

title: Lauren Evans Osborne
gameEffect: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this resource when all tokens have been discarded.
dialogue: "Whenever I see him, my vision goes blurry and thisâ€¦sickness overtakes me. He's always there, no matter where I go." - Lauren, on encountering Slender Man

title: Whitman College, Walla Walla, WA
question: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.
dialogue:
Scully: "Last night, a faculty member was found dead in the stairwell under suspicious circumstances."
Mulder: "Can we skip to the part where you explain why this is a FBI matter?"

title: Slender Man
gameEffect: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. The Witness is discarded and the Team is attacked! Agents must immediately discard all attached "Camera" Equipment cards. Slender Man is unaffected by MARTIAL ARTS cards. Damage caused by this Adversary may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).
dialogue: I saw a pale figure, tall, in a black suitâ€¦ He had no face, no eyes" - Lauren Evans Osborne

title: Lurking in Plain Sight
gameEffect: Force an opponent Team to make an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check. If they fail, apply a -3 modifier to the Site skill check and your opponent must discard all Witness cards from their hand.
dialogue:
Mulder: "What is it, Scully?"
Scully: "I thought I saw someone, watching from over there. Did you see him?"
Mulder: "No, but then again my eyesight's not what it used to be."

title: Michael Myers
gameEffect: This Adversary regenerates (Heals) two points of HEALTH at the beginning of each combat round as long as his HEALTH is not at 0. Michael Myers may use SUBTERFUGE cards. If killed in combat, return Myers to your Bureau deck and shuffle.
dialogue:
Scully: "You're the Oxford psychologist. What are we up against?"
Mulder: "I'm not convinced what we're dealing with is entirely human."

title: Haddonfield, IL
question: You may ask one AFFILIATION or one MOTIVE question.
dialogue: "Since 1978, Haddonfield has been synonymous with Michael Myers, the notorious serial killer who stalked and killed an untold number of townspeople." - Mulder

title: Confronting the Shape
gameEffect: Play this card when an Adversary is about to enter Combat with a single Agent. Search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Combat card to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.
dialogue: "Federal Agent! Drop your weapon!" - Mulder

title: Yumi Sagiuchi Shultz
gameEffect: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to negate one Bluff or Event that forces an Agent on the Team to go to the Hospital.
bio: Yumi Sagiuchi Shultz is violist for the Bergen Philharmonic Orchestra in Norway. She and her husband, Martin, encountered Agents Mulder and Scully during their investigation into several bizarre attacks by troll-like creatures.

title: Martin Shultz
gameEffect: Adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check. This card is free if played on a Team that includes Yumi Sagiuchi Shultz.
dialogue:
Martin Shultz: "Are you the FBI Agents my sister contacted?"
Scully: "That's right. I admit we were reluctant to travel all this way, but she insisted that your situation here warranted our attention."

title: Hanseatic Quarter, Bergen, Norway
question: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.
dialogue:
Scully: "There's a lot of history in these ramshackle warehouses."
Mulder: "This harbor town wears its maritime heritage proudly, but I'm more interested in what dark otherworlds exist beneath its rustic veneer."

title: Old Leprosy Hospital, Bergen, Norway
question: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.
dialogue:
Scully: "This place looks a lot like the one I saw in West Virginia."
Martin Shultz: "This area was once the leprosy capital of the world. The facility was abandoned in the mid-twentieth century."

title: Funicular
gameEffect: Attach this card to an Agent in the Field. Discard this card to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Keyword MOVE card to your hand. Show the card to your opponent and shuffle your Bureau Deck. If the card is immediately playable, you may do so for zero [RP] cost.
dialogue: "It's safer than riding a tram." - Mulder

title: Troll Territory
gameEffect: Play this card to reduce the [CP] Cost of all Keyword SUBTERFUGE cards played at this Site by 1. While this card is in play, any OCCULT or EVOLUTIONARY Adversaries played at this Site may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.
dialogue:
Scully: "The stench is unbearable."
Mulder: "I think we've wandered into troll territory, Scully."

title: Guillaume Saladin
gameEffect: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Resource card. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.
bio: As a supply chain manager, Guillaume Saladin ensures that the store he oversees is stocked consistently. Guillaume watches 90's TV shows and collects vinyl records. His beloved cat, CholÃ©ra, is never far from his side.

title: Fort Boyard, Coastal West France
question: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.
dialogue:
Mulder: "This fort was built under Napoleon, right?"
Guillaume Saladin: "Yes, and Louis-Philippe. It was a military prison before it was abandoned around 1900."

title: Don't Turn Around!
gameEffect: Play this card to apply a -2 modifier to the Site skill check. In addition, one Agent on the Team (your choice) may not contribute their Combat skills this turn.
dialogue:
Mulder: "Scully? Are you seeing this?"
Scully: "Listen to me very carefully, Guillaume. We're gonna get you outta there."

title: CholÃ©ra the Cat
gameEffect: Adds 1 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill. Place a token on this card. Remove a token to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Keyword HEALING card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
dialogue: "Pretty fierce feline you got there. We've seen our share of 'em in the States." - Mulder

title: David Pease
gameEffect: Place a token on this card. Remove a token to search your Bureau Deck to draw any one Equipment card. Show this card to your opponent, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.
bio: As a self-proclaimed "data nerd", David Pease provides information, research and resources. Growing up in a region rife with paranormal activity, he is ready to put his expertise to practical use. David has keen observation skills and firearms training.

title: Forks High School, Forks, WA
question: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.
dialogue: "Some of the faculty have been working at this school their entire careers. Maybe some of them have seen or heard something other than rumors" - Scully

title: Cape Flattery Trail, Neah Bay, WA
question: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.
dialogue:
Scully: "The hair found on the victm is canine in origin."
Mulder: "Look at this bite mark on his neck. It's precisely on the jugular."
Scully: "What are you saying, Mulder? That a vampire attacked a werewolf?"

title: Forks Timber Museum, Forks, WA
question: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.
dialogue: "The museum's been around since the town was built. Everything about Forks is here. Residents,businesses, photos, newspaper, everything. We just finished putting it in the computer about six months ago." - Johnathon Woods

title: Silver Bullets
gameEffect: Adds 3 to an Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skills when played against an OCCULT Adversary for the duration of this combat.
dialogue: "Silver is softer than lead, so it's not as effective in normal circumstances. But when silver enters the body of one of these abominations... it's payback time." - David Pease

title: FN Herstal Five-seveN
gameEffect: Adds 3 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.
dialogue: "5.7x28mm bullets can penetrate up to level 2 body armor and pierce bulletproof glass. Yeah... this'll do." - David Pease

title: Shadow - Coastal Northwest Werewolf
gameEffect: This card may be played at a Site where another Coastal Northwest Werewolf has been played, ignoring Activator requirements. The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.
dialogue: "Be careful, these things travel in packs. If you see one, it's likely there are more stalking us, ready to pounce." - David Pease

title: Grey Wind - Coastal Northwest Werewolf
gameEffect: This card may be played at a Site where another Coastal Northwest Werewolf has been played, ignoring Activator requirements. The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.
dialogue: "Be careful, these things travel in packs. If you see one, it's likely there are more stalking us, ready to pounce." - David Pease

title: Sahale - Coastal Northwest Werewolf
gameEffect: This card may be played at a Site where another Coastal Northwest Werewolf has been played, ignoring Activator requirements. The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.
dialogue: "Be careful, these things travel in packs. If you see one, it's likely there are more stalking us, ready to pounce." - David Pease

title: Tahoma - Coastal Northwest Werewolf
gameEffect: This card may be played at a Site where another Coastal Northwest Werewolf has been played, ignoring Activator requirements. The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.
dialogue: "Be careful, these things travel in packs. If you see one, it's likely there are more stalking us, ready to pounce." - David Pease

title: Maya - Coastal Northwest Vampire
gameEffect: LONG RANGE COMBAT will cause no damage to the Vampire. This Adversary gains +1 CLOSE RANGE COMBAT for each subsequent round of CRC that her HEALTH is no at zero.
dialogue:
Scully: "There was blood throughout her digestive system, but the blood was from an animal, not a human."
David Pease: "These monsters' only motivation is to drink human blood to survive. If it's been starving itself of human blood, that would explain why it went into a frenzy when I was wounded."

title: Maggi Forrester
gameEffect: Play this card to reduce the Site Prerequisite of any one COMPUTER or OCCULT INVESTIGATION Site by 1. This card is free is played at "Forks High School".
dialogue: "Forks has always been connected to a darker side of the world." - Maggi Forrester

title: Johnathon Woods
gameEffect: Attach this card to an OCCULT INVESTIGATION Site during your Case Assignment Phase together with two tokens. The Site stays in the Field as long as this card is attached. Remove a token every time you send a Team of Agents to investigate the Site. Discard this card when the last token is removed.
dialogue: "The timber museum has been in my family since it was built." - Johnathon Woods
